Text:
Alpha and Zeta continue to inflict damage until the
evil spirit's body finally begins to stagger.
Alpha! Now!
Got it! Time for the finish!

Alpha leaps and swings her sword. Its sharp blade
slices through the evil spirit.

The damaged evil spirit begins to vanish. Its ominous
aura disperses as its body evaporates.
Whoa there! Now that's a big Bone. Time to collect!

After a brief silence, the weapons in Alpha and
Zeta's hands vanish into light particles.
...It's over...
Finally...
Good job, Zeta...
You too, Alpha... Oh...my body feels heavy...

You seem tired but not injured...so it's time we
switch back to the original channel.
Hold on to me, both of you. We're heading back.
Are we back?

...Yes, I think... There seem to be more people
around than in the other world.
The two look at each other before both collapsing.

I didn't think it would be this tough! That was
nothing like a normal fight...
...I don't normally fight.

Your moves were great, considering that.
It's incredible you can fight so well.
Are you actually an experienced fighter?
Absolutely not.

I would've handled things better if I had more
experience. I relied on you a lot, Zeta.

Anyway, we make for an incredible team! I think we're
perfect for each other. How about the two of us throw
hands next time?
Absolutely not.

Tsk. I thought we could invent an imaginary bone to
pick with each other.
"Bone to pick"? Are we talking about dogs again?
You know...never mind.

As Alpha and Zeta talk while gazing up at the sky,
Nuru peers at their faces.

Thanks again for all your hard work. Your mastery of
the weapons was brilliant. You've far exceeded my
expectations...

But it's not over yet. Small fissures will continue
to form, and an even larger evil spirit will likely
emerge next time.

You've convinced me of what you're capable of this
time around. You're the only ones I can rely on...
so...will you continue to help me?
Nope.
Huh?
Not unless we at least increase our numbers a little.
Um, sure.

The enemy is formidable, so we'll need to increase
our fighting power.
Yup, yup!

And we need a base of operations as well as the
necessary funds!
I-I'm not sure I can guarantee that...

A-Alright! Now that you're on board, I'll do...
something about increasing our personnel.

Alpha will communicate her requests, intent on doing
everything she can. She feels a surge of enthusiasm
for what the future holds.

However, she is unable to dispel her fatigue as her
vision wavers.
Ah...

Her eyelids slowly become heavier. She cannot resist.
Nuru and Zeta's voices gradually grow more distant.
The final bit of conversation she hears is—

Also, let's see...if we're going to recruit more
people, we'll need a name for our organization...

A name for our organization? It's gotta be something
cool!
Hmmm... The name of our organization will be—
...dow Garden.
*gasp*
Oh, you're awake?

It's rare to see you doze off in a place like this.
Were you tired?
Err, umm...Cid?
Yup...but why do you sound so unsure?

Wait, maybe I have some slime left on my face? Or is
something wrong with my hair?

No...it's not that. My mind feels groggy as if I've
just woken up from a very long dream.
A dream? What was it about?
...I don't remember.

Well, dreams are strange, aren't they? I often don't
remember what I dreamt about after I wake up,
but I'll vaguely recall having fun.

Right... I feel like it was a fun and magical dream.
I hope I can dream about it again.

Although Alpha cannot remember anything about her
dream, she feels an unmistakable passion stirring
within her heart. She smiles quietly, hoping one day
she will recall it.
